data.eml:eml: Revision of the Scytinopteridae (Hemiptera: Cicadomorpha: Scytinopteroidea) of the Queensland Triassic

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lambkin, Kevin J. (2016): Revision of the Scytinopteridae (Hemiptera: Cicadomorpha: Scytinopteroidea) of the Queensland Triassic. Zootaxa 4117 (4): 580-590, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4117.4.9
